summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganLine, define, and fill lips with powerfully pigmented, cult-favorite Morphe Signature Lip Pencil color that glides on effortlessly.
details: DetailsFeaturesCreamy, highly pigmented colorGlides on to line and define lipsSharpenable tip for complete color controlResearch Results100% agreed it feels weightless on lips97% agreed itâ€™s easy to use and blend94% agreed it glides smoothly and does not feather*based on a 35 subject consumer perception studyItem 2646205How To UseLine the outside of the lips starting at the corners using light pressure and working towards the top center.For the longest lasting color, fill in your lips after lining. For more impact, layer on a lipstick or gloss.IngredientsBubble Bath: Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Ozokerite, Polyethylene, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, C10-18 Triglycerides, Mica, Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina, Cire microcristalline), Tridecyl Trimellitate, Mineral Oil (Paraffinum liquidum, Huile minÃ©rale), Polyisobutene, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax (Cera Carnauba, Cire de carnauba), Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 6 Lake (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410).
how_to_use: Line the outside of the lips starting at the corners using light pressure and working towards the top center.For the longest lasting color, fill in your lips after lining. For more impact, layer on a lipstick or gloss.

reviews.comments: The liner is so creamy, goes on perfect and doesn't drag and you can color on your lips without just lining and it's pretty long lasting. The color is amazing.

media.headline: Pigmented
media.caption: Morphe Signature Lip Pencil Junior Suite

faceoff_positive.comments: I've been on the hunt for a reliable, everyday lip liner that doesn't drag or feel too dry, and this one from Morphe really hits the mark. The formula is incredibly creamy, which makes for a super smooth and effortless application. It glides on without tugging at the lips and the color payoff is excellent. I picked up the shade "Sweet Tea" and it's this beautiful, universally flattering rosy-brown nude that works perfectly under almost any lipstick or gloss I own. I've found it helps extend the wear time of my lip products significantly, preventing feathering throughout the day. The one minor drawback is that because it's so soft, you do need to sharpen it a bit more often than a harder pencil, but that's a small trade-off for how comfortable it is to wear. Overall, it's a fantastic, affordable option that I'll definitely be repurchasing. It's a great addition to my makeup bag.
faceoff_positive.headline: A New Go-To: The Morphe Signature Lip Pencil

faceoff_negative.comments: I received this Morphe lip liner for free to sample and review. The quality of the product is really impressive. It was long-wearing, easy to apply, and blended beautifully with my natural lip. The only downside was that I didn't receive the correct shade, and the color I got just didn't quite complement my skin tone. However, I really liked the smoothness and performance of the formula, and I would definitely try it again in a shade that better suits me.
faceoff_negative.headline: Great Formula, Just Not My Shade
